abstract: Adding to a growing collection of financial crisis histories, Sheila Bair, former head of the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation, takes aim at some regulatory colleagues.
snippet: Adding to a growing collection of financial crisis histories, Sheila Bair, former head of the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation, takes aim at some regulatory colleagues.
lead_paragraph: Sheila C. Bair, who tormented Wall Street and its Washington allies as a banking regulator, is taking a fresh swipe at her foes in retelling the dark days of the financial crisis.

headline.main: Ex-Regulator Has Harsh Words for Bankers and Geithner
headline.print_headline: Ex-Regulator Has Harsh Words for Bankers and Geithner

byline.original: By Ben Protess and Peter Eavis
